Name: thoracic disease
Definition: A disease of anatomical entity that is located_in the thoracic cavity.

Name: cardiovascular system disease
Definition: A disease of anatomical entity which occurs in the blood
Synonym: disease of subdivision of hemolymphoid system

Name: obsolete Pars plana exudative cyst
Definition: A disease of anatomical entity which occurs in the blood

Name: obsolete idiopathic urticaria
Definition: A disease of anatomical entity which occurs in the blood

Name: reproductive system disease
Definition: A disease of anatomical entity that is located_in reproductive system organs.

Name: respiratory system disease
Definition: A disease of anatomical entity that located_in the respiratory system which extends from the nasal sinuses to the diaphragm.

Name: integumentary system disease
Definition: A disease of anatomical entity that is located_in the integumentary system comprising the skin and its appendages.

Name: musculoskeletal system disease
Definition: A disease of anatomical entity that occurs in the muscular and/or skeletal system.

Name: urinary system disease
Definition: A disease of anatomical entity that is located_in kidney

Name: endocrine system disease
Definition: A disease of anatomical entity that is located_in endocrine glands which secretes a type of hormone directly into the bloodstream to regulate the body.

Name: obsolete ear tuberculosis
Definition: A disease of anatomical entity that is located_in endocrine glands which secretes a type of hormone directly into the bloodstream to regulate the body.

Name: immune system disease
Definition: A disease of anatomical entity that is located_in the immune system.

Name: hematopoietic system disease
Definition: A disease of anatomical entity that has_material_basis_in hematopoietic cells.

Name: gastrointestinal system disease
Definition: A disease of anatomical entity that is located_in the gastrointestinal tract.

Name: obsolete AIDS-related oropharyngeal candidiasis
Definition: An oropharyngeal candidiasis that involves fungal infection of the oropharynx by Candida species in AIDS patients.

Name: obsolete human papilloma virus related endocervical adenocarcinoma
Definition: A human papillomavirus related adenocarcinoma that results_in infection

Name: obsolete Cytomegalovirus esophagitis
Definition: A Cytomegalovirus infectious disease that results_in infection located_in esophagus

Name: nervous system disease
Definition: A disease of anatomical entity that is located_in the central nervous system or located_in the peripheral nervous system.
